text:
Hi all,
 
 
I’m starting my own lab at the newly founded National Innovation Center for advanced medical devices (NMED) in Shenzhen,China. I’m looking for 1-2 postdoc in both light sheet microscopy development and bio-image analysis.
 
The postdoc position is fully funded with a competitive salary package.
 
 
If you know anyone who’s interested in developing cutting edge light sheet hardware and image analysis guided microscopy, feel free to shoot me an email at <mailto:jy.he@nmed.org.cn|jy.he@nmed.org.cn>
